name: Soul Taker
description:
Developed by SlovGoblin, SoulTaker is a Fun Card Game With a Relaxing Atmosphere and Anime Like Visuals, combined with a Cute Card Dealer. Win your way out of Hell by Playing SoulTaker.

Key Features

AnimeVisuals
Relaxing Smooth Environment
Cute Demon Dealer
Easy to Learn GamePlay
Simple Controls
Warm Atmposheric and welcoming
